data.name: Beauty and the Beast
data.detailed_description:
Explore, uncover, and unravel the mystery behind the Beast and his residence in this first-person narrative adventure.

As a person who stumbles into a mysterious residence, you find yourself trying to find a way out while uncovering the owner's tragic history.

Explore, decipher, and unlock more of your environment and the secrets it holds.

Features

  • Beautiful atmospheric environments to explore and discover
  • Unravel the mystery of the Beast's emotive backstory through personal journals and memoirs
  • Examine important items up close and decipher their connection to the story
  • Solve simple navigation puzzles as you explore the many rooms of the Beast's residence
  • Fluid and elegant controls and gameplay
